meanings.sent1: The candy shop had the gummiest bears on display.
meanings.sent2: The new rain boots were the gummiest ones she had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The gummiest stickers were stuck all over his backpack.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gummiest as a piece of chewed gum.
meanings.sent5: The gummiest texture of the slime made it hard to put down.

meanings.definition: Having a sticky or chewy texture
meanings.sent1: The gummiest candy stuck to his teeth.
meanings.sent2: The gummiest caramel was her favorite treat.
meanings.sent3: The gummiest bubblegum made the biggest bubbles.
meanings.sent4: His words were as gummiest as taffy, hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The gummiest doughnuts were always the first to sell out.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to stick or adhere
meanings.sent1: The gummiest tape held the poster in place.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes were the gummiest, always getting stuck in mud.
meanings.sent3: The gummiest glue kept the broken vase together.
meanings.sent4: His friendship was as gummiest as glue, always there when needed.
meanings.sent5: The gummiest stickers refused to come off the paper.
